scripts.docker-clean: docker-compose rm && docker-compose pull && docker-compose build --no-cache wordpress-unit-tests && docker-compose up -d --force-recreate --build db && docker-compose up -d --force-recreate --build wordpress-unit-tests && docker exec wordpress_test /usr/local/bin/dockerInit wordpress wordpress wordpress db latest latest true
scripts.phpunit: docker-compose up -d db && docker-compose up -d --build wordpress-unit-tests && docker exec -it --workdir /var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/trusted-shops-easy-integration-for-woocommerce ts_easy_integration_wordpress_test php ./vendor/bin/phpunit
